comments:
Start eclipse
1) Create new project
2) Ceate new MRT
3) Double cliick on any capablity
4) First time throws below excepion
5) Second click - crashes eclipse with Sun 1.4.2
6)Using IBM and Sun 15 - No exception and no eclipse crash
7)Using IBM Java 1.4.2 -below exception is seen for the first click, but no crash, and not exception is seen later
